Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA announced it would transition all plastic credit and debit cards to be made from at least 80% recycled plastic starting in 2023, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Enhancement of Customized Cash Rewards Card
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA expanded its Customized Cash Rewards credit card, allowing cardholders to earn 3% cash back in categories of their choice, such as gas and online shopping, increasing the card's appeal.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Settlement Over Overdraft Fees and Credit Card Practices
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA paid over $100 million to customers in a settlement after being accused of repeatedly charging $35 overdraft fees for the same transaction, withholding credit card rewards, and enrolling customers in credit card accounts without their knowledge or authorization.

BofA earned the 2024 J.D. Power Financial Health Support certification for outstanding client satisfaction with financial health support among banks and credit card issuers, for the third year in a row.
BofA reported that December 2024 card spending per household increased by 2.2% year-over-year, indicating strong consumer engagement with BofA credit cards.
BofA expanded its Preferred Rewards program, offering up to a 75% credit card rewards bonus for eligible members, enhancing loyalty among existing customers.
BofA began issuing contactless credit cards, providing a faster and more secure payment method, aligning with consumer preferences for convenience.
BofA was named Best Consumer Digital Bank in the U.S. by Global Finance, reflecting its commitment to digital innovation in credit card services.
BofA enhanced its mobile app, allowing credit card customers to manage rewards and payments more efficiently, improving user experience.
BofA agreed to a settlement over allegations of withholding credit card rewards and enrolling customers in accounts without consent, impacting customer trust.
BofA introduced virtual credit cards for online shopping, enhancing security and appealing to tech-savvy consumers.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Premium Rewards Elite Credit Card
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA launched the Premium Rewards Elite credit card, targeting high-net-worth individuals with exclusive benefits.
A data breach exposed sensitive credit card information of thousands of customers, leading to concerns over security and privacy.
BofA earned the J.D. Power Financial Health Support certification for outstanding client satisfaction with financial health support among credit card issuers.

BofA began issuing contactless credit cards, providing a faster and more secure payment method, aligning with consumer preferences for convenience.
BofA implemented advanced fraud detection systems, increasing consumer trust and security in credit card transactions.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Cash Rewards Credit Card for Students
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA introduced a cash rewards credit card tailored for students, aiming to attract younger customers and promote financial responsibility.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Partnership with Major Retailers for Exclusive Offers
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA partnered with leading retailers to provide exclusive discounts and offers to credit cardholders, enhancing the value proposition of its cards.
BofA offered 0% APR balance transfer promotions to attract customers looking to consolidate debt, increasing its competitive edge in the market.

Bank of America Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Premium Travel Rewards Credit Card
Bank of America Credit Card Business.description: BofA introduced a premium travel rewards credit card, targeting frequent travelers with enhanced benefits and earning potential.
